content.description: Fowl Chatter offers easy slab climbing for those needing a warmup route or a route to cut your teeth on. Learning to lead? Want to start placing cams? This route offers a mix of bolts and hand crack cam placements. Start on the lower slab, following the line of bolts to the ledge then up the pocketed middle face. Head straight up and plug in a couple cams to protect the easy upper dihedral. Use a two bolt rap anchor with chains to descend or climb out left to top belay off a tree.
content.protection: 5 bolts, small - med cams, two bolt rap anchor with chains
content.location: Fowl chatter is eighty feet right of Artifact, just past the extending, rounded lower slab. The five bolts form a straight line angling up and right towards the ledge and upper dihedral.Use a two bolt rap anchor with chains to descend or climb out left to top belay off a tree.

content.description: Shaded slabs extending between Artifact Wall and Scarface Wall. Solid below the chert band.
